::Lord Elder::

Elder came from the shuttle sprawling down a zip line. With his free hand he took aim with his blaster rifle. He takes well placed shots at any near Sweeps.

Once Elder came to the end up the zip line he was close enough to a low roof top to swing to it. Once on solid footing he continues to fire at the enemy.

::Grimlock::

Grimlock comes leaping from the shuttle with total disregard for his well being. While in T-Rex mode Grimlock catches two Sweeps under his huge feet riding them into the ground.

Grimlock: Who fight me Grimlock?!!

Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Crew: Sir, we are in artillery firing range!
 
 Jotunn: Autoguns, fire at will, designated targets only! I want a
 Defense crew here to protect the ships. Everybody else, attack!
 
 He opened a hatch and threw himself in the air. He was freefalling,
 but used a passing sweep to break his fall, colliding for a second
 only, then landing abruptly on his feet.
 
 Jotunn: DRAGON CORPS, LIVE FOREVER!
 
 He located the nearest sweep and fired a sustained barrage with his
 gatling gun.
 
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Lord Elder::
 > 
 > Elder draws his weapon and checks it over. Once he was sure it was
 in good order he sat back.
 > 
 > Elder: Good luck to all.
 > 
 > Nic <warriorazure@...> wrote:                               Jotunn
 smiled: I am glad I have your support. Grimlock, there'll be
 >  plenty of metal for you to much, and Elder, I will make sure no one
 >  undeserving leaves with the Matrix. Now get ready, we're here soon.
 >  
 >  He turned to the crew.
 >  
 >  Trooper: Commander, we're entering flier range now. Artillery range in
 >  1 cycle.
 >  
 >  Jotunn: Allright! Fliers, you are good to go!
 >  
 >  A swarm of about 10 fliers left the transport ships and headed for the
 >  battlefield They all had special weaponry equipped: special bullets
 >  that would get lodged into their enemies and that would designate them
 >  for artillery fire. They were ready to engage the enemy.
 >  
 >  Jotunn: Communications, advise the defenders that we're coming in as
 >  reinforcements. Tell them to make sure they revert to medium- or
 >  long-range attacks. It's their priority to disengage melee attack.
 >  
 >  Comms sent the message.
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ::Grimlock/Elder::
 >  > 
 >  > Grimlock, while in T-Rex mode smacks one of his fists into the palm
 >  of his other hand.
 >  > 
 >  > Grimlock: Me Grimlock want to munch metal!
 >  > 
 >  > Elder looked down in thought. Jotunn was leading the group in a very
 >  aggressive Predacon way. Elder is a Maximal at heart and this bothers
 >  him. However he knows that to fight what they are faced with it may be
 >  the only way.
 >  > 
 >  > Elder looks up at Jotunn.
 >  > 
 >  > Elder: No prisoners on this day. It is important to protect Rodimus
 >  Prime. I have a feeling that the Minions are actually after just one
 >  thing: The Matrix...
 >  > 
 >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                               Jotunn:
 >  Right. All hands to their station. We launch in 3, 2, 1, Lift off!
 >  >  
 >  >  The transports shuddered as they left the dock but, as they cleared,
 >  >  gained more and more speed until they were over the land and
 bound for
 >  >  Atlantis.
 >  >  
 >  >  Jotunn: This will take some time. I want a team of fliers
 standing by.
 >  >   You'll be the spearhead. We can't use the autoguns before we have
 >  >  clear enemy IDs. Your job will be to throw the minions in
 disarray and
 >  >  to paint them for artillery to take them down. We want to avoid
 >  >  friendly fire at all cost. Once the most of them are gone,
 ground team
 >  >  takes over. I want you to pack as much a punch as possible We shoot
 >  >  for the kill against them, because if they retreat, they'll come
 back
 >  >  even worse after that. Understood?
 >  >  
 >  >  The crew signified its approval. Jotunn then looked over to Grimlock
 >  >  and Elder.
 >  >  
 >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >  >
 >  >  > OOC: I could probably help with Grimlock starting now.
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > ::Lord Elder/Grimlock::
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > The Watcher leader and revived Dinobot head to the transports with
 >  >  Jotunn and take their places.
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > Elder: Let's not waste much time. Those Maximals are getting
 >  >  slaughtered.
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > Grimlock: Me Grimlock seen this before. Fight big! Autobot City...
 >  >  > 
 >  >  > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                               OOC: I
 >  >  spoke with Kham on the phone yesterday. Could somebody help me
 >  >  >  with Grimlock? I'll take care of Remus and let Razorwing
 sleep until
 >  >  >  he gets back.
 >  >  >  
 >  >  >  BIC:
 >  >  >  
 >  >  >  Jotunn: Thank you. My lord Elder, Grimlock, if you'd follow me
 >  >  please...
 >  >  >  
 >  >  >  He ran to the ships where the troops where almost done with
 >  >  preparations.
 >  >  >  
 >  >  >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "khamkain" <khamkain@> wrote:
 >  >  >  >
 >  >  >  > ooc: Still in school rushed so I won't be able to post a
 lot for
 >  >  about
 >  >  >  > two or three week so i'll let Nic take control of Remus,
 >  >  Razorwing and
 >  >  >  > Grimlock until everything cooled down a bit.
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > bic: Razorwing : Since the city is still in bad shape I can
 >  only let
 >  >  >  > you off with about 30 men and three airtransport loaded with
 >  autogun.
 >  >  >  > You're going to have two airfigther to cover you. That's
 >  pretty much
 >  >  >  > what I can do right now but keep in contact radioand I migth
 >  be able
 >  >  >  > to get you some reinforcement.
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > 
 >  >  >  > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@>
 wrote:
 >  >  >  > >
 >  >  >  > > ::Lord Elder::
 >  >  >  > > 
 >  >  >  > > Elder: I don't have that ability either. I hope Relay can
 >  spare a
 >  >  >  > transport.
 >  >  >  > > 
 >  >  >  > > Nic <warriorazure@> wrote:                              
 >  Deadfur:
 >  >  >  > Roger that, sir.
 >  >  >  > >  
 >  >  >  > >  Deadfur starts sending signals to Atlantis asking to send a
 >  >  situation
 >  >  >  > >  report and telling them that reinforcements are en route.
 >  >  >  > >  
 >  >  >  > >  Jotunn: There is just one problem, Elder: I can't fly.
 >  >  >  > >  
 >  >  >  > >  > ::Lord Elder::
 >  >  >  > >  > 
 >  >  >  > >  > Elder: Deadfur, try and hail Atlantis. I want to know how
 >  >  bad they
 >  >  >  > >  are hurt. We'll need to assemble a group to got help them.
 >  I'll go
 >  >  >  > >  with them. If you can get in contact with anyone at
 Atlantis,
 >  >  I want
 >  >  >  > >  to know the status of Rodimus Prime. He is the best hope
 >  against
 >  >  >  > >  Unicron's forces.
 >  >  >  > >  > 
 >  >  >  > >  > Elder redirects his attention.
 >  >  >  > >  > 
 >  >  >  > >  > Elder: Razorwing, how many can we afford to send to
 >  >  Atlantis? I'll
 >  >  >  > >  go with Jotunn and Grimlock.
 >  >  >  > >  
 >  >  >  > >
